item.description:
The film is showing at 7. Lets meet up at 6:30 and head in at 6:45 to get seats.


If the movie is showing upstairs I will try to snag a table near the windows at the top of the escalator. If it is downstairs I will be near the ropes by the concession stand. I will be wearing a Boston Movie Group Badge.

If you miss the group before going into the theater and don't see us inside, we will gather outside in the hallway for a bit and to discuss the movie and get a head count of everyone who would like to go out for drinks and munchies after.

The trailer for this looked like quite a hoot. Bad one liners and explosions....sounds like my kind of fun!

Movie Details:

The name of the movie is "The Losers"

Release Date: April 23, 2010
Studio: Warner Bros. Pictures
Director: Sylvain White
Screenwriter: Peter Berg, James Vanderbilt
Starring: Jeffrey Dean Morgan, Zoe Saldana, Chris Evans, Idris Elba, Columbus Short, Holt McCallany, Oscar Jaenada, Jason Patric, Peter Macdissi
Genre: Action, Thriller
MPAA Rating: PG-13 (for sequences of intense action and violence, a scene of sensuality and language)
Official Website:

http://www.the-losers...


Plot Summary: An explosive tale of double cross and revenge, "The Losers" centers upon the members of an elite U.S. Special Forces unit sent into the Bolivian jungle on a search and destroy mission. The team--Clay, Jensen, Roque, Pooch and Cougar--find themselves the target of a lethal betrayal instigated from inside by a powerful enemy known only as Max. Presumed dead, the group makes plans to even the score when they're joined by the mysterious Aisha, a beautiful operative with her own agenda. Working together, they must remain deep undercover while tracking the heavily-guarded Max, a ruthless man bent on embroiling the world in a new high-tech global war.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a Boston Movie Group badge, at a table upstairs by escalators or by ropes near concession stand depending of if the movie is playing upstairs or down.
item.name: The Losers
